item.title: Jail Error [317]
item.dc:creator: @Smudgerx360 Smudgerx360
item.description:
@Smudgerx360 wrote:

[quote=“horses2007, post:2, topic:469565”]if(playerCommand.startsWith("jail")) { try { String playerToBan = playerCommand.substring(5); for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerToBan)) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[i]; c2.teleportToX = 3102; c2.teleportToY = 9516; c2.Jail = true; c2.sendMessage("You have been jailed by "+c.playerName+""); c.sendMessage("Successfully Jailed "+c2.playerName+"."); } } } } catch(Exception e) { c.sendMessage("Player Must Be Offline."); } }

post any problems[/quote]

what about unjail :o!? & it did’nt work, c.sendmessage is not delta and the code isnt. its PI

if(playerCommand.startsWith("jail")) { try { String playerToBan = playerCommand.substring(5); for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerToBan)) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[i]; c2.teleportToX = 3102; c2.teleportToY = 9516; c2.Jail = true; c2.sendMessage("You have been jailed by "+c.playerName+""); c.sendMessage("Successfully Jailed "+c2.playerName+"."); } } } } catch(Exception e) { c.sendMessage("Player Must Be Offline."); } }
